Hymn.Arabic: " أرسل موسى عبده، وهارون الذي أختاره،
Hymn.English: 26 He sent Moses His servant, And Aaron whom He had chosen.
27 They performed His signs among them, And wonders.

Hymn.Arabic: كي يحفظوا حقوقه ويطلبوا ناموسه. هلليلويا "
Hymn.English: 45 That they might observe His statutes And keep His laws.
